arabic_text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ كَانَتۡ لَهُمۡ جَنَّٰتُ ٱلۡفِرۡدَوۡسِ نُزُلًا
translation: (107) Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds - they will have the Gardens of Paradise[803] as a lodging,
footnotes: [803]- i.e., the highest part of Paradise, al-Firdaus.
